name: Zaze Demo
description:
A very small demo concept for a game I might make in the future. It will be a maze like first person game, but thats all I know for now. There is no end, just explore the small map. There  is no sound, nor game play, and this page will not be updated, but a full game from the ground up will be redirected here: : when avalible.

The Full game will be a maze game, what about, I'm not too sure yet, but you'll be trying to find your way out.
